name: SSISBuild
description: This is the official SSIS Build Task for SSIS DevOps from Microsoft.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: projectPath
inputs.label: Project path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the project folder or file to be built. If a folder path is specified, SSIS Build task will search all dtproj files recursively under this folder and build them all.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Project configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the project configuration to be used for build. If not supplied, it defaults to the first defined project configuration in each dtproj file.

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of a separate folder to save build results, which can be published as build artifact via Publish build artifacts task.
